<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eye of Fortune](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3083)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 289 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 2,700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn eyepiece

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Adherents of [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6), god of the hunt, create these magical eye patches. An eye of fortune has a jeweled eye symbol on its front, allowing you to magically see through the eye patch as though it were transparent. 

**Activate—Luck Beyond Sight** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76))
  **Trigger** You attack a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) creature and haven't attempted the flat check yet;  **Effect** You can roll the flat check for the concealed or hidden condition twice and use the higher result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Eye of Fortune
